```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(glue)
my_theme <- theme_classic() +
  theme()
theme_set(my_theme)
set.seed(20240201)
```

```{r}
samples <- read_csv("../data/blooms.csv") |>
  mutate(class = factor(class))
p_hat <- read_csv("../data/p_hat.csv")
colnames(p_hat) <- c("index", "prob")
p_hat <- p_hat |>
  mutate(subject = glue("subject_{index + 1}"))

xy <- samples |>
  left_join(p_hat) |>
  select(-subject:-class)
```

```{r}
p_hat <- decision_tree() |>
  set_mode("regression") |>
  fit(prob ~ ., data = xy) |>
  predict(xy)

bind_cols(class = samples$class, p_hat) |>
  count(class, .pred > 0)
```

```{r}
xy <- select(samples, -subject)
y_hat <- decision_tree() |>
  set_mode("classification") |>
  fit(class ~ ., data = xy) |>
  predict(xy)

bind_cols(class = samples$class, y_hat) |>
  count(class, .pred_class)
```
